title: Realspace® Magellan 59"W Manager's Computer Desk, Blonde Ash
descriptions:
Introducing the Realspace® Magellan 59"W Manager's Computer Desk in Blonde Ash! 

This high-quality desk is perfect for both home and professional use. With its medium-density fiberboard construction and paper laminate finish, it offers durability and a sleek look. The desk measures 59 inches in width, providing ample space for all your computer and office essentials.

Featuring a slide-out keyboard tray and a total of 4 drawers, including 1 file drawer and 3 box drawers, this desk offers convenient storage options to keep your workspace organized. The desk is also scratch-resistant and water spill-resistant, ensuring it stays looking pristine for years to come.

Assembly is required, but don't worry! The desk comes with clear instructions, and our customer service team is available to assist you if needed. Please note that due to its weight and size, it may require more than one person to handle during assembly.

Rest assured, the Realspace® Magellan 59"W Manager's Computer Desk complies with ANSI/BIFMA Performance Standards, guaranteeing its quality and durability. 

For those who prefer not to assemble the desk themselves, in-home assembly service is available. Simply contact our team at 866-388-4350 to arrange for professional assembly.

Upgrade your office or home workspace with the Realspace® Magellan 59"W Manager's Computer Desk in Blonde Ash today!

Compliance with ANSI/BIFMA Performance Standards guarantees the highest quality and safety standards. We prioritize your safety and satisfaction.

Please note that this desk is heavy and/or oversized, so it may require more than one person to handle. We recommend taking necessary precautions while moving or assembling the desk.
